_rawstat Struct Reference

The structure describes the RAW Statistics block. More...

#include <rawif.h>


Data Fields

UINT32 RcvTotal
 Total packets received.
UINT32 RcvFull
 Unable to take more data.
UINT32 SndTotal
 Total packets sent.
UINT32 SndNoPacket
 Unable to allocate packet.

Detailed Description

The structure describes the RAW Statistics block.

This structure is used to hold various stats and counters by the RAW module. A separate copy of this stats is maintained by the IPv4 and IPv6 stacks.

The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file:
  • inc/stack/inc/rawif.h
